title: Trust No One (except me)
description:
Many crypto lenders, exchanges and hedge funds have gone bust in the last month... begging the question. Who Can You Trust?  Three Arrows Capital, LUNA, Celcius, Vauld, and more are all among the recent casualties.
Follow Coffeezilla: 
► Twitter: https://twitter.com/coffeebreak_YT
► Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/coffeebreak_yt/
🎶 Music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nMSQ1yoPT2c&list=PL4qw3AkxFDSNhEgawXD1j6r0iN1072XIB&index=1
Credits: 
3D Artist: Ed Leszczynski https://twitter.com/LeszczynskiEd
Video Editor: Harry Bagg  https://twitter.com/HarryRBagg
Virtual Production Software: Aximmetry https://aximmetry.com/

This video is an opinion and in no way should be construed as statements of fact. Scams, bad business opportunities, and fake gurus are subjective terms that mean different things to different people. I think someone who promises $100K/month for an upfront fee of $2K is a scam. Others would call it a Napoleon Hill pitch.
